contact-us.title: Contact Us
contact-us.description: Our call centres and Service Canada Centres operate Monday to Friday, from 8:30 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., your local time. They are closed on statuary holidays.

call-us.title: Call us
call-us.description: You can reach us at either of the numbers below.

find-office.title: Find an office
find-office.description: Find a Service Canada Centre near you using the link below.

banner.title: Are you ready to retire?
banner.text: Countless of factors need to be considered to find out when best to retire. Take our quiz to receive personalized information on benefits.

tabs.title: Learn
description: Learn about the "three pillars" of Canada's retirement system.
There are many factors to consider before retiring to help ensure that you can comfortably retire.

links.title: Sources of retirement income
links.description: Your income during retirement will typically come from three main sources

links.title: Financial Support
links.description: Learn about your different financial support options.
